entry.def: In linguistics, phonic means relating to the sounds of speech.

example.ex: ...the phonic system underlying a particular language.
example.tran: 某种特定语言的发音体系

entry.def: Phonics is a method of teaching people to read by training them to associate written letters with their sounds.

means.word_mean: 1. pertaining to the phonic method of teaching reading
3. of or relating to speech sounds;
